scripts.start: npx concurrently "cd checkout; npm run dev" "cd home; npm run dev" "cd shop; npm run dev"
scripts.build: npx concurrently "cd checkout; npm run build" "cd home; npm run build" "cd shop; npm run build"
scripts.serve: npx concurrently "cd checkout; npm run start" "cd home; npm run start" "cd shop; npm run start"
